name: A Home Remembers
description:
Created by OCDunlap , Joe, and myself. 

Content Warning: Mature Language & Themes, Sexual Assault

A Home Remembers is a game where you play a detective hired by people who want to buy a home. Using a special device, you detect objects in the house which have memories. If you can find them, these objects tell you stories about themselves and the history of the home, helping you collect information for your client.

WASD or arrow keys to move while not using the device.
Left Click to hold up the device and look for objects with stories to tell.
Look at objects while close to them with the device to hear their stories.
M to return to main menu.

Made for the 2019 GGJ: https://globalgamejam.org/2019/games/home-remembers
